content: **materials** cotton kings 8/8 100% cotton 82 yards / 75 meters 1 7 ounces / 50 grams 1 skein for 2 coasters other yarn options lily sugar n cream bernat handicrafter cotton hobby lobby i love this cotton **hook & other materials** hook us g6 / 4 00 mm scissors yarn needle measuring tape stitch marker optional **sizes** teal 5 across mustard 6 5 across at the widest point purple 5 25 square **experience level** easy the pattern is written in standard us terms ✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽✽ all patterns at canoe mtn designs are tested by experienced crochet artisans for accuracy and readability my crochet patterns will teach you how to create the perfect gift for any occasion and any friend/family member/loved one copyright© 2020 audrey friesen all rights reserved you may sell what you make but please credit canoe mtn designs for the pattern you may not use my photos you may not resell the pattern distribute it in any form post it online or alter it to claim it as your own **need help ** we re here for you contact us anytime for pattern support or questions **note ** this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued **where to find your purchased pattern ** log into your ravelry account find the library you pattern and all the patterns you have purchased can be found there
